title: Match History question

replies.body:
Hey there,

The numbers that I assume you're referring to do indicate champion level as far as I'm aware, it's possible that they may display higher than 18 during URF games.

Yeah i got as high as 29 from Urf. Was looking at the mechanics, i figured they just added a couple of 00's to the algorithms to make the 80% CDR viable in the game system which may have impacted the way experience was gathered etc and represented the level you'd have gained should you be able to go past 18.

The URF thing is what confused me.

Thanks for clarifying, i guess this issue won't come up for another year!
